title: Through the Misty Mountains (1U198)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, exert a [Moria] minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves to site 4, 5, or 6 and contains a Dwarf or Elf, the Free Peoples player discards 2 cards at random from hand.
Lore:	”'One must tread the path that need chooses.'”
Rarity:	U
